ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] My morning..
ygData.msgSnippet: Gypsiee: Tunare loves & protects all of her Wood-elves from jerkos like him. Rest assured I ll keep an eye out & give him a wide berth. It s odd though, that
ygData.messageBody:
Gypsiee:

Tunare loves & protects all of her Wood-elves from jerkos like him.

Rest assured I'll keep an eye out & give him a wide berth. It's odd though,
that such a twinked person would be so clueless...


Gates

Thundyr, Wood Elf Druid of the EIGHTH season
(at the rate I'm moving, I'll never make it to double digits!!)


----- Original Message -----
From: "Sandy Collier" <sandycol@...>
To: "EQ Rainbow" <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 12, 2000 11:57 AM
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] My morning..


> Hello all!
>
> I just wanted to tell you about my morning and about a very irritating
> person in Rodcet Nife. Today I entered Crush Bone right after a nasty
train
> had chased me out. I came upon a TROLL (His name is/was Bezerker) who
con'd
> green to me (He was ALSO very twinked..FULL Crafted..Exe. Axe etc. ) and
was
> be being hit on by a lowly GREEN orc. Needless to say we all know the woes
> of trying to loot while having something hit us..we don't like it. SO, I
> kill the greeny orc. Bezerker THEN curses me out for being a KS'er and
says
> he has reported me. I was STUNNED! I spoke with him a few moments to
assure
> him of my good intent but he would have none of it. Upon exiting CB I saw
> him in a duel with another PC. The PC won and I applauded. The Bezerker
> person was apparently not to bright because he was BOUND in G Fay and had
> died numerous times. I was impressed to see that he undone himself by
dying
> too much. Upon getting killed ONCE more by Orcs, his TWINKED body
> Decayed...EVERYTHING he had on him was GONE** POOF**. I know now that
there
> is a goddess and she loves me :)
>
> Signed,
>
> Gypsiee (Sandy)
>
>
